item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】WAV - Take That - Serenity (HMV Edition bonus track) [CDRIP 44100kHz 16bit]
item.description:
Seeing the ridiculous prices on Discogs and Ebay, there's no way in hell I'm gonna let this highway robbery continue.

Decode at https://www.base64decode.org/

Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
Lyrics from the booklet

Days go by and I don't feel the rain
But I know deep down it's not so far away
Making inroads, sometimes I lose
My heart's wide open wherever I'm running to

You're the birds when they sing
Stop the scars before they set in
You're the calm after the storm
You keep me warm
I can feel your sunshine washing over me
I can feel your thunder
Hope it's coming to wake me
Like a big sky in Nevada on a New Year's Eve
Baby when you hold me
That's serenity
That's serenity

All doors open, a warm breeze within
Just eyes closing the desert planes begin
Night time silence, peacefully we sleep
Right here, right now, it ends and begins

You're the birds when they sing
Stop the scars before they set in
You're the calm after the storm
You keep me warm
I can feel your sunshine washing over me
I can feel your thunder
Hope it's coming to wake me
Like a big sky in Nevada on a New Year's Eve
Baby when you hold me
That's serenity

A perfect harmony
The most beautiful scene
Heaven-sent, in this I believe
Let it start again
You're the calm after the storm
You keep me warm

I can feel your sunshine washing over me
I can feel your thunder
Hope it's coming to wake me
Like a big sky in Nevada on a New Year's Eve
Baby when you hold me
That's serenity
That's serenity
A perfect harmony
item.author: KingOfHell1661
